title: Spades
description: Stuck in the deadly Hatterthon game, Rose reaches the finals and must face-off with those she loves...and those she's falling in love with.Facing her enemies is easy. Rose doesn't flinch when she takes another player's life. All she wants is to go home.But when friends become enemies and new-flames burn brighter than shooting stars, the black and white world she lives in starts to turn grey at the edges.Rose thought she would do anything to get home to Crooked Grove, a village lost to the rebels, but secrets unravel like ribbons in the Hatterthon, and she soon learns that the Hatterthon never intended on letting her go...Previously published as Hearts 2019 part 2. Second Edition.
author: Klarissa King
